item.title: Trump denies that he plans to fire Powell: 'Highly unlikely'
item.description: The comments came after the Supreme Court indicated that President Donald Trump does not have the authority to arbitrarily fire Fed Chair Jerome Powel...

item.title: Wholesale inflation measure was unchanged in June
item.description: The producer price index for June was expected to increase 0.2%, according to the Dow Jones consensus estimate.

item.title: Inflation picks up again in June, rising at 2.7% annual rate
item.description: The consumer price index in June was expected to increase 2.7% from a year ago, according to the Dow Jones consensus estimate.

item.title: UK inflation hits hotter-than-expected 3.6% in June
item.description: Economists polled by Reuters had anticipated inflation would reach 3.4% in the twelve months to June.

item.title: Inflation report Tuesday should provide clues on the impact tariffs are having on prices
item.description: June's inflation report will be looked at not so much for what the headline numbers show than what's in the underlying data.
